title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 12, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 12, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Love2d
items.content_text:
### IDEs

*   [Zed](https://zed.dev) - Zed is a next-generation code editor designed for high-performance written in rust.
    *   [love2z (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/alejandro-alzate/love2z) - Alejandro's Beta typing hints for Zed.
    *   [love2d (‚≠ê41)](https://github.com/LuaCATS/love2d) - LuaCATS typing hints for the lua language server.
items.content_html:
IDEs

  • Zed - Zed is a next-generation code editor designed for high-performance written in rust.
    • love2z (‚≠ê7) - Alejandro's Beta typing hints for Zed.
    • love2d (‚≠ê41) - LuaCATS typing hints for the lua language server.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Completions / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [flatpak (‚≠ê38)](https://github.com/bilelmoussaoui/flatpak-zsh-completion) - Tab completions for [Flatpak](https://docs.flatpak.org/en/latest/using-flatpak.html).

### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [gcloud-prompt (‚≠ê22)](https://github.com/ocadaruma/zsh-gcloud-prompt) - Shows the current gcloud configuration in the prompt.

### ZSH Tools / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [argcomplete (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/kislyuk/argcomplete) - Generates tab completions for programs using Python's `argparse` module.
items.content_html:
Completions / superconsole - Windows-only

  • flatpak (‚≠ê38) - Tab completions for Flatpak.

Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • gcloud-prompt (‚≠ê22) - Shows the current gcloud configuration in the prompt.

ZSH Tools / superconsole - Windows-only

  • argcomplete (‚≠ê1.5k) - Generates tab completions for programs using Python's argparse module.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Autonomous LLM Agents / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

*   [Hexabot (‚≠ê756)](https://github.com/hexastack/hexabot) Open-Source AI Chatbot / Agent builder with support for LLMs as well as social media channels integration.

### LLM Evaluation / Multi-agents

*   [Indico LLM Leaderboard](https://indicodata.ai/llm): Indico Data runs a monthly benchmarking exercise across providers (LLama, Azure OpenAI, Google, AWS Bedrock, and Indico trained discriminative standard language models RoBERTa and DeBERTa), datasets (e.g. cord and CUAD), and capabilities (text classification, key information extraction, and generative summarization).
*   [LLM Rankings](https://openrouter.ai/rankings): a leaderboard that compares LLMs for all prompts.
items.content_html:
Autonomous LLM Agents / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

  • Hexabot (‚≠ê756) Open-Source AI Chatbot / Agent builder with support for LLMs as well as social media channels integration.

LLM Evaluation / Multi-agents

  • Indico LLM Leaderboard: Indico Data runs a monthly benchmarking exercise across providers (LLama, Azure OpenAI, Google, AWS Bedrock, and Indico trained discriminative standard language models RoBERTa and DeBERTa), datasets (e.g. cord and CUAD), and capabilities (text classification, key information extraction, and generative summarization).
  • LLM Rankings: a leaderboard that compares LLMs for all prompts.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Authentication and OAuth

*   [gosession (‚≠ê258)](https://github.com/Kwynto/gosession) - This is quick session for net/http in GoLang. This package is perhaps the best implementation of the session mechanism, or at least it tries to become one.
items.content_html:
Authentication and OAuth

  • gosession (‚≠ê258) - This is quick session for net/http in GoLang. This package is perhaps the best implementation of the session mechanism, or at least it tries to become one.

items.title: Awesome Ai Tools
items.content_text:
### Text / Developer tools

*   [Hexabot](https://hexabot.ai) - A Open-source No-Code tool to build your AI Chatbot / Agent (multi-lingual, multi-channel, LLM, NLU, + ability to develop custom extensions)

### Image / Services

*   [Pixvify AI](https://pixvify.com/) - Free realistic AI photo generator platform
items.content_html:
Text / Developer tools

  • Hexabot - A Open-source No-Code tool to build your AI Chatbot / Agent (multi-lingual, multi-channel, LLM, NLU, + ability to develop custom extensions)

Image / Services

  • Pixvify AI - Free realistic AI photo generator platform

items.title: Learn to Program
items.content_text:
### Intermediate

#### [LabEx](https://labex.io)

**Freemium** hands-on tech skills labs in virtual environments, supported by an AI study assistant\
*(Linux, Docker, DevOps, Python, Data Science, Machine Learning, Go, Java, C, C++, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React)*

### Advanced

#### [MIT OpenCourseWare](https://ocw.mit.edu/search/?t=Computer%20Science)

**Free** courses from MIT on advanced computer science topics\
*(varied and extensive computer science topics, C, C++)*
items.content_html:
Intermediate

LabEx

Freemium hands-on tech skills labs in virtual environments, supported by an AI study assistant
(Linux, Docker, DevOps, Python, Data Science, Machine Learning, Go, Java, C, C++, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React)

Advanced

MIT OpenCourseWare

Free courses from MIT on advanced computer science topics
(varied and extensive computer science topics, C, C++)

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### IDE and Code Editing

*   [GetVM](https://getvm.io) ‚Äî Instant free Linux and IDEs chrome sidebar. The free tier includes 5 VMs per day.
items.content_html:
IDE and Code Editing

  • GetVM ‚Äî Instant free Linux and IDEs chrome sidebar. The free tier includes 5 VMs per day.

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:
### Applications / Blockchain

*   [reth (‚≠ê4.8k)](https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth) - Modular, contributor-friendly and blazing-fast implementation of the Ethereum protocol.

### Applications / Security tools

*   [AdGuardian-Term (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/Lissy93/AdGuardian-Term) \[[adguardian](https://crates.io/crates/adguardian)] - Terminal-based, real-time traffic monitoring and statistics for your AdGuard Home instance
items.content_html:
Applications / Blockchain

  • reth (‚≠ê4.8k) - Modular, contributor-friendly and blazing-fast implementation of the Ethereum protocol.

Applications / Security tools

  • AdGuardian-Term (‚≠ê1.1k) [adguardian] - Terminal-based, real-time traffic monitoring and statistics for your AdGuard Home instance

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Reading and Writing Tools / Text Editors

*   [CodeEdit](https://www.codeedit.app/) - A lightweight, natively-built editor. Open source. Free forever. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/CodeEditApp/CodeEdit) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [Neovim (‚≠ê91k)](https://github.com/neovim/neovim) - Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/neovim/neovim) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")

### Utilities / Menu Bar Tools

*   [OnlySwitch (‚≠ê4.9k)](https://github.com/jacklandrin/OnlySwitch) - ‚öôÔ∏è All-in-One menu bar app, hide üíªMacBook Pro's notch, dark mode, AirPods, Shortcuts[![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/jacklandrin/OnlySwitch) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")

### Utilities / General Tools

*   [ChatGPT](https://openai.com/chatgpt/mac/) - ChatGPT on your desktop. Chat about email, screenshots, files, and anything on your screen. Download. Available now on macOS.

### Remote Login Software / System Related Tools

*   [AnyDesk](https://anydesk.com) - Provides remote access across multiple machines.
*   [Moonlight (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/moonlight-stream/moonlight-qt) - GameStream client for PCs (Windows, Mac, Linux, and Steam Link). [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/moonlight-stream/moonlight-qt) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [Parsec](https://parsec.app) - Parsec offers a seamless 4k experience at up to 60 frames per second with near-zero latency. Secure, flexible, effortless access to whatever you do, at any time, from wherever you go.
*   [RoyalTSX](https://www.royalapps.com/ts/mac/features) - Royal TSX is an ideal tool for system engineers and other IT professionals who need remote access to systems with different protocols. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [RustDesk](https://rustdesk.com/) - Yet another remote desktop software. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/rustdesk/rustdesk) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [Steam Link](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/steam-link/id1246969117) - The Steam Link app allows you to play your Steam games across all your computers. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [Sunshine (‚≠ê27k)](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine) - Self-hosted game stream host for Moonlight. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [TeamViewer](https://www.teamviewer.com/en) - Proprietary computer software package for remote control, desktop sharing, online meetings, web conferencing, and file transfer between computers. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [Windows App](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/windows-app/id1295203466) - Connect to a remote PC or virtual apps and desktops made available by your admin. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
items.content_html:
Reading and Writing Tools / Text Editors

  • CodeEdit - A lightweight, natively-built editor. Open source. Free forever.
  • Neovim (‚≠ê91k) - Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability.

Utilities / Menu Bar Tools

  • OnlySwitch (‚≠ê4.9k) - ‚öôÔ∏è All-in-One menu bar app, hide üíªMacBook Pro's notch, dark mode, AirPods, Shortcuts

Utilities / General Tools

  • ChatGPT - ChatGPT on your desktop. Chat about email, screenshots, files, and anything on your screen. Download. Available now on macOS.

Remote Login Software / System Related Tools

  • AnyDesk - Provides remote access across multiple machines.
  • Moonlight (‚≠ê14k) - GameStream client for PCs (Windows, Mac, Linux, and Steam Link).
  • Parsec - Parsec offers a seamless 4k experience at up to 60 frames per second with near-zero latency. Secure, flexible, effortless access to whatever you do, at any time, from wherever you go.
  • RoyalTSX - Royal TSX is an ideal tool for system engineers and other IT professionals who need remote access to systems with different protocols.
  • RustDesk - Yet another remote desktop software.
  • Steam Link - The Steam Link app allows you to play your Steam games across all your computers.
  • Sunshine (‚≠ê27k) - Self-hosted game stream host for Moonlight.
  • TeamViewer - Proprietary computer software package for remote control, desktop sharing, online meetings, web conferencing, and file transfer between computers.
  • Windows App - Connect to a remote PC or virtual apps and desktops made available by your admin.
